ARABIC: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We have been sent to a people who are evildoers -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "Verily we have been sent to a guilty people
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "We are sent to a sinful people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We have been sent to a guilty people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Surely we are sent towards a guilty people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'We have been sent unto a people of sinners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We have been sent unto a guilty folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "We have been sent forth to a guilty people."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: verily we have been sent unto a people guilty-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We have been sent toward a guilty people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (the angels) said: "We have been sent to a people who are Mujrimun (criminals, disbelievers, polytheists, sinners).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We are sent to sinful nation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We were sent to a sinful people.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:58] They said, ‘We have been sent to a sinning folk, a disbelieving [folk], namely, the people of Lot, in order to destroy them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We have been sent unto a guilty folk) to idolaters who brought destruction upon themselves because of their evil acts, meaning here the people of Lot.
